ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Calculate common survey data quality indicators for multi-item scales and matrix questions. Currently supports the calculation of response style indicators and response distribution indicators. For an overview on response quality indicators see Bhaktha N, Henning S, Clemens L (2024). 'Characterizing response quality in surveys with multi-item scales: A unified framework' <https://osf.io/9gs67/>.

Calculate common survey data quality indicators for multi-item scales and matrix questions. Currently supports the calculation of response style indicators and response distribution indicators. For an overview on response quality indicators see Bhaktha N, Henning S, Clemens L (2024). 'Characterizing response quality in surveys with multi-item scales: A unified framework' <https://osf.io/9gs67/>.

name: r-resquin
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.1.1' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-resquin
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/resquin_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/resquin/resquin_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: f26adf00055c9d503c99400040d919713f6b728e47244768b14a8f58e1cbcf71

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/
  missing_dso_whitelist:
    - '*/R.dll'        # [win]
    - '*/Rblas.dll'    # [win]
    - '*/Rlapack.dll'  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-cli
    - r-purrr
    - r-rlang
    - r-slider
    - r-stringi
    - r-tibble
    - r-vctrs
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-cli
    - r-purrr
    - r-rlang
    - r-slider
    - r-stringi
    - r-tibble
    - r-vctrs

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('resquin')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('resquin')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/MatRoth/resquin, https://matroth.github.io/resquin/
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  summary: 'Calculate common survey data quality indicators for multi-item scales and matrix
    questions. Currently supports the calculation of response style indicators and response
    distribution indicators. For an overview on response quality indicators see Bhaktha
    N, Henning S, Clemens L (2024). ''Characterizing response quality in surveys with
    multi-item scales: A unified framework'' <https://osf.io/9gs67/>.'
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - rgaiacs
